features.featureTitle: In frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, remove the 'Invite a friend and help grow our community!' informational banner section entirely (including the Share/Invite button and its container). The rest of the HomePage layout, sections (hero, Featured Animals, listings grid, filters), and functionality must remain structurally unchanged.

In frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx, replace the current fifth tab ('Account') with a 'Share' tab. The Share tab must display an appropriate share/invite icon (e.g., a share or forward arrow icon) and the label 'Share'. The updated Bottom Navigation Bar must have exactly five tabs in this order: 'Home' (routes to '/'), 'Chats' (routes to '/messages'), 'Sell' (routes to '/post-ad', styled prominently as the center raised button), 'My Ads' (routes to '/dashboard' for authenticated users), and 'Share' (triggers the Web Share API or clipboard fallback using the existing useWebShare hook). The bottom bar must retain the clean white background and Professional Blue active-state indicator styling.

Update the visible version label displayed in the app to 'Version 49'. Find the version string wherever it appears in the footer, header, or any other visible UI element within Layout.tsx or any page component and update it to read 'Version 49'.
